ingredients.ingredient: 1 (8 ounce) package Monterey Jack cheese, cut into strips
40 large shrimp - peeled, deveined and butterflied

cookingTips: Use sharp Monterey Jack cheese for better flavor and texture in these simple appetizers
Butterfly shrimp by cutting along the back without completely severing to create a pocket for the cheese
Bake at 400Â°F until bacon is crispy and shrimp are pink and opaque, about 12-15 minutes
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These simple yet elegant appetizers combine three essential ingredients in perfect balance. How would you prevent the cheese from leaking out during cooking?
